name: FaniTrade
description: FaniTrade is a complete suite of decentralized applications built on the Solana blockchain. Our protocols serve as a permission-less, low-cost, and scalable ecosystem that democratizes traditional exchanges. With an objective to provide more flexibility and efficiency to DEX traders, FaniTrade introduced the limit swap feature to buy and sell assets at the desired price amounts. FaniSwap is just one of the many protocols that will be rolling out in Phase 1, 2 & 3 as outlined in the roadmap.
